dmca.title: DMCA notice to Google, Inc.
dmca.body:
EVERSHEDS 

Google Inc 
Attn: Google Legal Support 
DMCA complaints 
1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy Mountain View 
CA 94043 
USA 

Date 16 April 2007 
Your ref #133637326 
Our ref RML/TRS/138988.010004 
Direct Dial 0845 497 0997 
Direct Fax 020 7849 4919 
tomstrange@eversheds.com

BY FAX - 001 650 963 3255 

Dear Sirs 
http://jhleslie.googlepages.com/letterfromeversheds
http://jhleslie.googlepages.com/terminationletter

We refer to our letter dated 23 March 2007 and a subsequent e-mail exchange, culminating in an e-mail from Google Help dated 11 April 2007. 

As outlined previously, we are instructed by Fastsigns International Inc, a Texan based company specialising in the production of signs. Our client franchises its business both in the US and in the UK. Our client has recently been engaged in a dispute with one of its UK franchisees, Mr James Leslie, in relation to various breaches of his Franchise Agreement dated 9 August 2004 and we have been assisting our client in relation to this. 

In an e-mail dated 11 April 2007, we made reference to two offending web pages set up by Mr Leslie, upon which he has posted confidential letters in breach of his obligations under his Franchise Agreement and in breach of our copyright. 

In response to your e-mail of 11 April 2007, we set out below the information requested: 

1. The copyrighted works at issue are the letter than appears on
http:jhleslie.googlepages.com/letterfromeversheds and the letter and draft Termination and Release Agreement that appear on http://jhleslie.googlepages.com/terminationletter. 

2. The copyright in the copyrighted works is owned by Eversheds LLP. Any implied licence for Mr Leslie to use the copyright in these documents did not extend to publishing them on the internet. As such Mr Leslie is in breach of copyright. 

3. The contact information of the individual dealing with this case is: 
Name and Title: Mr Tom Strange
Company: Eversheds LLP
Address: Senator House, 85 Queen Victoria Street, London EC4V 4JL 
Email address: tomstrange@eversheds.com 
Telephone: 00 44 845 497 0997 
Fax: 00 44 20 7919 4919 

The required declaration is as follows: 


I, Tom Strange, of Eversheds LLP do solemnly and sincerely declare as follows: 

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorised by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

5. 1 swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorised to act of behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

6. Signed: _____________________ 
Tom Strange 
Solicitor 
For Eversheds LLP 

In light of the above, we request that you ensure that the web pages are removed forthwith and provide us with confirmation that this has been done. 

We look forward to receiving a timescale for the removal of the offending webs pages by return. 

EVERSHEDS LLP
